action.name: Call function
action.param: "Logged in with username: " & Multiplayer.MyAlias & " (" & Multiplayer.MyID & ")" & newline & "Joining room..."

action.name: Log
action.param: Multiplayer.StatInboundCount & " in (" & (round(Multiplayer.StatInboundBandwidth/100)/10) & " k) / sec" & newline & Multiplayer.StatOutboundCount & " out (" & (round(Multiplayer.StatOutboundBandwidth/100)/10) & " k) / sec" & newline & "Host ping " & round(Multiplayer.PeerLatency(Multiplayer.HostID)) & ", PDV " & round(Multiplayer.PeerPDV(Multiplayer.HostID))

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Peer angle: " & Peer.Angle & " Peer gravity angle: " & Peer.Platform.GravityAngle & " Peer moving angle: " & Peer.Platform.MovingAngle & " Ball angle: " & Ball.Angle & " Ball motion angle: " & Ball.Bullet.AngleOfMotion

action.name: Call function
action.param: " Ball angle: " & Ball.Angle & " Ball motion angle: " & Ball.Bullet.AngleOfMotion
